headline: The Cooper Companies, Inc. (NASDAQ:COO): An Eye-Catching Proposal
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on The Cooper Companies, Inc. (NASDAQ:COO) on ValueInvestorsClub by dsteiner84. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on COO. The company’s shares were trading at $98.10 when this thesis was published, vs. the closing price of $81.22 on Mar 14. COO develops, manufactures, and markets contact lens […]
